page.title: 10Industry in Stallingborough
page.content: The area has only two factories, the largest produces man made fibre and has its own power station, using oil and coal mixed with shredded rubber and domestic waste. The smaller factory produces synthetic rubber latex, fuelled by gas and oil. There is an industrial estate only a small part being in our area. This is taken up by 24 small firms of transport services, engineering, shipping services and motor bodies. In this area Industry covers app. 138 acres, employing 1300 workers, 300 staff, 85 management and contracting 100 workers. The man power comes from a ten mile radius.
